purpose: Educate developers on integrating generative AI capabilities into .NET applications using Azure and Semantic Kernel
principle: Leverages Azure AI services and Semantic Kernel to demonstrate generative AI concepts and their application in .NET
reusability: Structured as a series of lessons that can be reused for educational purposes, includes code samples and Azure integration
limitations: Requires Azure subscription for full functionality, primarily focused on educational use rather than production deployment
name: Generative-AI-for-beginners-dotnet
description: Five lessons, learn how to really apply AI to your .NET Applications
highlight: Comprehensive introduction to applying generative AI in .NET applications through practical lessons
